cause.description:
Do you enjoy making bold statements of intent but lack the determination and dedication to turn words into action? Are you content with making promises and breaking them within a few minutes? Do you delight in grandiose platitudes but shy away when presented with real opportunities to do something meaningful?
If so, then this is the cause for you, the cause that's meant to be abandoned... so please join now.
1. Words speak louder than actions.
2. Joining a cause never helped anybody.
3. This is all pretty much pointless.
cause.mission: talk a big game and ultimately do nothing.
cause.name: Join This Cause And Then Don't Follow Through
